Definition: Given an English language product review, you must determine if it is a Good Review or a Bad Review. A good review is one where the review has a positive tone and a Bad review is one where the review has a negative tone.

Positive Examples.input: The sound seems really good but sometimes it cuts in and out which is annoying. You have to put the cord directly into your ipod. Other than that, its a simple design with nothing fancy. I love how cheap they were for 10 dollars... But overall nice design... No one can steal me earphones. lol thanks again amazon.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is good because it has positvie tone as the reviewer suggested it really likes the sound and the output is also Good Review.So this example is positive example

Positive Examples.input: My son received this book as a gift. I was extremely disappointed. It is an old book, and the print quality and size are unreadable. At age 4, my 2 year old needs visual help to identify parts of his body at play. Maybe it would be OK for an older child with better sight. But don't waste your time or money. Go buy the new version called "Brain Power--Make Sense Of Opposites" instead.
Positive Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad because it has negative tone as suggested in the product review that the user is disappointed by the product and the output is also Bad review. So this example is positive example

Negative Examples.input: This is a terrific product. It does exactly as advertised and it was much less expensive here than at the store. Easy to attach & adjust both cameras from one DVR. We are buying 4 more of these for our other cameras. It looks like security personnel will now start to see us more often because they know how easy it is. Only drawback I could possibly come up with is that it's so sturdy we wonder if it needs some sort of tether attached to it. But no - it doesn't.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Good review as there is positive tone in the sentence but it has been output as Bad Review so this example is negative

Negative Examples.input: This thing is so cheap that I had to send it back; don't buy. The screen doesn't reflect anything of it's own size on the wall. It has an extremely light blue hue and looks nothing like any normal light fixture. Not even close to as bright or crisp looking in person & obviously very CHEAP made. Just pay a little more for something better. You will be completely satisfied with this product.
Negative Examples.explanation: Here the review is Bad review as there is negtvie tone in the sentence but it has been output as Good Review so this example is negative

Instances.input: This is a solid coffee pot no doubt about it and makes great coffee. It keeps the beverages VERY hot throughout my day. The only drawback for this product that I have found are 3 small holes in the bottom of the carafe to let in air. Even with those caveats, it's still an outstanding product.
You know, like some of these things do but there are two problems: they can't produce heat, and it's too flimsy for anything other than really light weight.
This is a great tool. The quality & design makes it very versatile. And I love the handle. It doesn't get uncomfortable in my hand. I'm looking forward to carving many more pieces.

If you have a real bad case, like me in which one of the sides cracked after a year, then avoid this product, my case was under warranty until October when I saw that they were no longer covering the cracks. DO NOT by from Acase.

As the picture on Amazon shows and as this product description describes it is a case with 2 hard shell pieces - one black piece that covers both the back (white) and also a rubber cover with opening in it.. Well it came complete with no openings for those pieces. I called Tech Armor on 11/23 to return it. After many email exchanges, two calls from their reps, they still had none of what was shown in the picture. This is deceptive advertising. Now I'm going after them.

I tried to get my money shipped back from Amazon, but there was no available option for it. It's cheap and flimsy junk. What really bothers me is, this is supposed to be an "amazon prime product- fulfilled by Amazon." How does that happen? Did somebody think of stealing some money. In order to protect your reputation as a reputable company in the digital age, you need to do better than this. This product came broken out of it's packaging.

The item arrived promptly. It is not the color advertised nor does it look like picuture. Very disappointed at this purchase, should have ordered a diffferent one. I sent an email asking to return it. Hope i will be notified of my options. Disappointed. And it cost too much for these type things. Wish they would give you credit with only half return. Don't remember if I even received the refund, as I sent them by email.

this isn't a book it is not an account of her life at all. there are stories and facts but all i got out of it was the author did do some things that you can find on youtube if your interested. I don't usually rate books so harshly because it's possible my fault for getting what i read to be more than just another autobiography.
